enumvalue.name: MAPVIEW
enumvalue.initializer: = All & ~(PAUSE | TIMEWARP | MISC | CAMERACONTROLS | MAP | VESSEL_SWITCHING | QUICKLOAD | QUICKSAVE | GUI | EDITOR_EDIT_NAME_FIELDS | TARGETING | MANNODE_ADDEDIT | MANNODE_DELETE | THROTTLE_CUT_MAX)

enumvalue.name: GROUPS_ALL

enumvalue.name: ALL_SHIP_CONTROLS

enumvalue.name: STAGE_IN_MAP_CONTROLS
